content.rendered:
Directed by Satish Kasetty.

Written by Lakshmi Bhupala. Mayank Jain. Satish Kasetty.

Cast Meka Srikanth(Vijay). Ravi Varma(Mujeeb (as supporting cast)). Kota Srinivasa Rao(Home Minister). Prudhviraj(MLA Ravi). Vinay Varma(DCP V. Rathod). Nikhita(Vijay’s wife). Nassar(Vijay’s father). Sudha(Vijay’s Mother). Uttej(Shiva). Priyadarshi Pulikonda(Terrorist (as Priyadarshi)) .Alauddin.Apparao.Gurucharan.Ramarao Jadhav.Jenny.Satish Kasetty.Lokesh Katam.Mujtaba Ali Khan.Sai Krishan.Mohan Kumar.Santhosh Kumar.Roopa Lakshmi.Kotesh Maanava.Madhavi.Mahesh.Ram Mohan.Rishi Muvva.Dls Prashanth.Sanjay Raichur.Narsimha Reddy.Reena.Kaushal Sharma.Raghuveer Sharma.Shivam.Srikanth.Govind Srinivas.Meesam Suresh.Bhanu Teja.Mayanand Thakur.Rajesh Touchriver.Veerabhadram.Venky.Vijayachander

Languages English. Telugu.

Producers Hari Ayineedi. Mastan Shaikk.

Production Akhanda Bharat Creations. Goldmines Telefilms.
